original: WHEREAS  as a new initiative,  Charity Tunes and Sponsor will enter into a promotional partnership, whereby  Sponsor will offer Charity Tunes music downloads on Sponsor ’s Pogo products  consistent with the terms and conditions of this Agreement (the “Promotion ”).
ollama_generated: WHEREAS, as a novel collaboration between parties, Charity Tunes and Sponsor shall embark upon a promotional alliance, under which Sponsor shall have the discretionary option to incorporate Charity Tunes' music downloads on its Pogo products, subject to the provisions and stipulations outlined within this Agreement (hereinafter referred to as "the Offering"). In contrast to the original clause, the power of decision regarding the implementation of the partnership lies with Sponsor.

original: Charity Tunes shall make its music catalogue available to the  purchasers in MP3 file format to the fullest extent that such format is  available to Charity Tunes pursuant to any agreements in effect between Charity  Tunes and its wholesalers on the date of this Agreement.  Accordingly,  Charity Tunes shall use its best efforts to update its music catalogue with  available MP3 files by June 30, 2009.
ollama_generated: The purchasers shall have access to Charity Tunes' music catalog in MP3 file format, subject to the limitations of the formats accessible to Charity Tunes under existing agreements with its wholesalers as of the effective date of this Agreement. Charity Tunes will endeavor to provide updated versions of its music catalog containing available MP3 files by June 30, 2009; however, any delays beyond this date shall not constitute a breach of this agreement, given the nature and complexities inherent in obtaining such rights from wholesalers.

original: The distribution  limits stated above are the maximum number of Pin Codes that may be distributed  in the Promotion.  No 3 - song, 5 -song, or 7 -song Pin Codes may be  subdivided, duplicated or distributed in combination with one  another.
ollama_generated: The distribution of Pin Codes as specified within this Promotion is the maximum allowance per recipient. It is expressly prohibited to fractionally divide, replicate, or pool together any 3-song, 5-song, or 7-song Pin Codes. Any attempts to circumvent these restrictions shall render the applicable Pin Codes invalid and ineligible for use within this Promotion.

original: The Charity Tunes  system used for redemption of downloads will ensure that (i) downloads are  obtained under the Promotion only by way of redemption of eligible Pin Codes and  only up to the maximum number of music downloads per Pin Code set out at paragraph 3 above, (ii) otherwise eligible Pin Codes are invalidated once they  have been used to download their respective per Pin Code maximum, and (iii) the  total maximum download limits described herein are observed.
ollama_generated: The Charity Tunes system utilized for download redemption will be responsible for: (i) restricting downloads to be acquired under the Promotion solely through the redemption of eligible Pin Codes, with each Pin Code limited to a maximum number of music downloads as specified in paragraph 3 above, (ii) rendering any previously eligible Pin Codes invalid once they have been used to reach their respective download limit per Pin Code, and (iii) enforcing the overall download limits outlined herein, while allowing for potential adjustments or exceptions at the sole discretion of Charity Tunes.

original: 13.1Relationship  between the Parties . Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed  as creating any relationship (whether by way of employer/employee, agency,  joint venture, association, or partnership).  It is expressly  understood that the relationship between the parties shall be that of  independent contractors, whether for the purposes of the Income Tax Act  (Canada), provincial taxation legislation or  otherwise.
ollama_generated: 13.1 Defining Party Relations: The terms set forth in this Agreement should not be interpreted as establishing any specific type of relationship (such as employer-employee, agency, joint venture, partnership, or association). It is explicitly acknowledged that the relationship between the parties shall be characterized as one where each party retains their respective independence, as defined under the Income Tax Act (Canada), provincial taxation legislation, or otherwise. In all instances, each Party remains solely responsible for their own actions and obligations, with no joint or shared liability arising from this Agreement.

original: 13.7Savings  Clause . If any  provision of this Agreement, or the application of such provision to any  person or circumstance, shall be held invalid, the remainder of this  Agreement, or the application of such provision to persons or  circumstances other than those as to which it is held invalid, shall not  be affected thereby.
ollama_generated: 13.7 Mitigating Clause: In the event that any provision of this Agreement is deemed unenforceable for a specific individual or scenario, such decision shall not nullify the entire agreement nor its application to different persons or circumstances, except in cases where the unenforceability affects the fundamental essence of the contract.

original: 13.10 Entire  agreement . This  Agreement contains the entire understanding and agreement among the  parties. There are no other agreements, conditions or representations,  oral or written, express or implied, with regard thereto. This Agreement  may be amended only in writing signed by all  parties.
modified: 13.10 Scope of Agreement: While this Agreement serves as the foundation of our understanding and agreement, it is acknowledged that there may exist oral or written communications, either express or implied, which supplement or clarify certain aspects of this document. Any such additional agreements, conditions, or representations shall be considered part of this Agreement, provided they are consistent with its terms and spirit. Modifications to this Agreement must be in writing and signed by all parties.

original: IN WITNESS WHEREOF , the parties have duly executed and delivered this Agreement:
ollama_generated:
FOR THE CONSIDERATION recited herein and in lieu of a physical signing ceremony, the parties affirm their electronic acceptance and execution of this Agreement, each having accessed it at their convenience and agreeing to its terms and conditions:

This change shifts the method of agreement execution from a traditional physical signing to an electronic one, implying a more flexible and modern approach.

original: 13.13 Successors . The provisions of this Agreement shall be binding upon all parties, their  successors and permitted assigns.
modified: 13.13 Successorship Clause: This Agreement's obligations shall apply only to the original parties; any subsequent assignees or successors are released from these commitments unless expressly assumed in writing by them.

original: 13.15 Law and Jurisdiction . This  Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the Province of Ontario and the  federal laws of Canada applicable therein. The parties hereby attorn to  the exclusive jurisdiction of the provincial and federal courts located in the city of Toronto, Ontario for all matters arising from this  Agreement.
modified: 13.15 Governing Law and Jurisdiction. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the Province of Ontario and the applicable federal laws of Canada, but with the understanding that the parties reserve the right to challenge any interpretation or application of these laws in a court of law. In case of disputes arising from this Agreement, the parties agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the provincial and federal courts located in Toronto, Ontario, retaining the option to bring actions in alternative jurisdictions if they deem it necessary or advantageous.

Date: June 25, 2009, duly executed under this Agreement:

In the event that either Party fails to fulfill its obligations under this Agreement without undue delay upon written notice from the other Party specifying the nature of the breach and allowing a reasonable period for remedy, the non-breaching Party shall have the right, but not the obligation, to terminate this Agreement without further liability. The termination shall be effected by delivering a termination notice in writing to the defaulting Party, which shall take immediate effect upon receipt. The termination of this Agreement shall not affect any accrued rights or liabilities of either Party at the time of such termination nor shall it release either Party from any obligations under this Agreement that are expressly stated as surviving termination.
